dcterms:creator: A. Fabbri
I. Li
T. She
S. Li
D. Radev
dcterms:description: A prominent generic multi-document summarization dataset consisting of news articles from various sources and human-written gold summaries. Each sample includes 2 to 10 source articles, with most samples containing 2-3 documents, and a respective human summary.
dcterms:title: MultiNews

dcterms:creator: S. Amar
L. Schiff
O. Ernst
A. Shefer
O. Shapira
I. Dagan
dcterms:description: A recent dataset for multi-document open aspect-based summarization, where the target summary focuses on a specified aspect within a topic, requiring models to process any given aspect that may not have been seen before.
dcterms:title: OpenAsp

dcterms:creator: A. Slobodkin
O. Shapira
R. Levy
I. Dagan
dcterms:description: A dataset that addresses the task of fusion-in-context, where each instance consists of 8 reviews of the same business, with spans highlighted within the reviews, requiring the generation of a coherent passage that fuses together all highlighted spans.
dcterms:title: FuseReviews

dcterms:creator: H. Trivedi
N. Balasubramanian
T. Khot
A. Sabharwal
dcterms:description: A dataset of questions based on Wikipedia texts, requiring models to integrate information from 2-4 documents to answer multi-hop questions.
dcterms:title: MuSiQue

dcterms:creator: A. Cattan
S. Johnson
D. S. Weld
I. Dagan
I. Beltagy
D. Downey
T. Hope
dcterms:description: A hierarchical cross-document coreference dataset for scientific concepts, primarily consisting of computer science paper abstracts and some full-text papers about artificial intelligence.
dcterms:title: SciCo

dcterms:creator: A. Cybulska
P. Vossen
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on lexical diversity and event coreference resolution in the news domain, specifically compiled to discuss similar topics.
dcterms:title: ECB+
